name: OR_LNLG_SPECIMENS
description: This table contains the Specimens information for the surgical log.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: SPEC_SENT_TO_C_NAME
columns.description: The location to which the specimen was sent.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: The site the specimen was collected from.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_DATE_SENT
columns.description: The date the specimen was sent.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_TIME_SENT
columns.description: The time the specimen was sent.
